definition: of a proposition that is necessarily true independent of fact or experience
details:
adjective
- of a proposition that is necessarily true independent of fact or experience
= example: of a proposition that is necessarily true independent of fact or experience
= synonyms: analytical
- expressing a grammatical category by using two or more words rather than inflection
= synonyms: uninflected
- using or skilled in using analysis (i.e., separating a whole--intellectual or substantial--into its elemental parts or basic principles)
= example: using or skilled in using analysis (i.e., separating a whole--intellectual or substantial--into its elemental parts or basic principles)
= synonyms: analytical
- using or subjected to a methodology using algebra and calculus
= example: using or subjected to a methodology using algebra and calculus
